item.description:
Come to TnT to demo WotC's new miniatures skirmish game Dungeon Command. Dungeon Command pits two commanders against each other in head-to-head battle.
Each player chooses a commander and faction deploying creatures and issuing orders through the use of two card decks.
Our demos start at 2PM on both Saturday and Sunday and are free. All those who take part receive a complimentary figure (while supplies last)

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: TnT's Dungeon Command Demo Weekend
